yup… its here. MY FIST MODEL!!! w000000t!!!

Platebody";

PlateBody Made by Lester Knome".getBytes();

This class.8 is kinda messed up, it i can’t get it the way it’s supposed to be so when you C&P it you may need to change a little. Once you gzip the model you change the #### to any Model id you want and the $$$$ to the item id.

The links:
Rar: http://fight4ever.com/Model1.rar
Zip: http://fight4ever.com/Model1.zip

Soz about the messy spikes, i couldn’t make them go on turn, if you know how please tell me.

NOTE: In your invetory it might just be a regular red plate but when you wear it its not.
